Hello,

I made these changes to enable git-annex to work correctly with gitolite and GitLab:
- fixed processing of repository urls ending with .git (GitLab recommends urls like that to users by default),
- git-annex-shell command is added to .gitolite.rc (disabled by default)
- command pattern is changed to allow for some characters git-annex may include in its arguments

These changes along with your commits in git-annex branch are also backported to gl-v320 branch of GitLab fork of gitolite - I created another pull request for those.

Best regards,
Oleg

/bin/bash is ALWAYS wrong. It should immedietly switched to
/usr/bin/env bash and in the long run switched to /bin/sh once
all of the bogus bashisms have been removed.

/usr/bin/perl is often correct, but not always. it is better to use env

Try using the checkbashism script to help fix things: http://sourceforge.net/projects/checkbaskisms/files/

Please read the Wiki for this repository; sitaram does not check or accept github Pull Requests. You should instead contact him via email, either directly or by the mailing list.
